languages.text: И опала преграда, и освободился Судия от пут, и боле ничто не мешало ему восстановить себя. Ибо если порядок осквернен — сломай его и начни с чистого листа.
And the obstacle fell, and the Judge was unbound, no longer prevented from restoring himself. For when order has been defiled and corrupted, break it down and begin anew.
languages.original_text: И опала преграда, и освободился Судия от пут, и боле ничто не мешало ему восстановить себя. Ибо если порядок осквернен — сломай его и начни с чистого листа.

traits.locale_text: And the obstacle fell, and the Judge was unbound, no longer prevented from restoring himself. For if the order has been defiled and corrupted, break it down and start afresh.
And the obstacle fell, and the Judge was unbound, no longer prevented from restoring himself. For if the order has been defiled and corrupted, break it down and start afresh.
And the obstacle fell, and the Judge was unbound, no longer prevented from restoring himself. For when order has been defiled and corrupted, break it down and begin anew.
And the obstacle fell, and the Judge was unbound, no longer prevented from restoring himself. For when order has been defiled and corrupted, break it down and begin anew.
And the obstacle fell, and the Judge was unbound, no longer prevented from restoring himself. For when order has been defiled and corrupted, break it down and begin anew.
And the obstacle fell, and the Judge was unbound, no longer prevented from restoring himself. For when order has been defiled and corrupted, break it down and begin anew.

languages.text: Und das Hindernis fiel, und die Fesseln des Richters fielen und er ward nicht länger daran gehindert, sich selbst wiederherzustellen. Denn wenn die Ordnung geschändet und untergraben wurde, reißt sie ein und beginnt von vorn.
languages.original_text: And the obstacle fell, and the Judge was unbound, no longer prevented from restoring himself. For when order has been defiled and corrupted, break it down and begin anew.

traits.locale_text: Und das Hindernis fiel, und die Fesseln des Richters fielen und er ward nicht länger daran gehindert, sich selbst wiederherzustellen. Denn wenn die Ordnung geschändet und untergraben wurde, reißt sie ein und beginnt von vorn.

languages.text: Y el obstáculo cayó, y el Juez quedó libre, sin que nada le impidiera restaurarse. Pues cuando el orden es profanado y corrompido, hay que destruirlo y empezar de nuevo.
languages.original_text: And the obstacle fell, and the Judge was unbound, no longer prevented from restoring himself. For when order has been defiled and corrupted, break it down and begin anew.

traits.locale_text: Y el obstáculo cayó, y el Juez quedó libre, sin que nada le impidiera restaurarse. Pues cuando el orden es profanado y corrompido, hay que destruirlo y empezar de nuevo.

languages.text: そして障害は崩れ落ち、ジャッジは解放され、もはや自らの再構築が妨げられることはなくなった。秩序が汚され、堕落したのであれば、それを壊して新たに始めよ。
languages.original_text: And the obstacle fell, and the Judge was unbound, no longer prevented from restoring himself. For when order has been defiled and corrupted, break it down and begin anew.

traits.locale_text: そして障害は崩れ落ち、ジャッジは解放され、もはや自らの再構築が妨げられることはなくなった。秩序が汚され、堕落したのであれば、それを壊して新たに始めよ。

languages.text: 所有障碍物都倒了下来。仲裁者挣脱了束缚，终于再度恢复了原状。当秩序遭到玷污、腐化时，就要将一切摧毁，从头开始。
languages.original_text: And the obstacle fell, and the Judge was unbound, no longer prevented from restoring himself. For when order has been defiled and corrupted, break it down and begin anew.

traits.locale_text: 所有障碍物都倒了下来。仲裁者挣脱了束缚，终于再度恢复了原状。当秩序遭到玷污、腐化时，就要将一切摧毁，从头开始。

languages.text: L'obstacle chut, et le Juge s'en trouva libéré, désormais libre de s'autorestaurer. Car lorsque l'ordre établi a été souillé et corrompu, il faut le détruire et repartir de rien.
languages.original_text: And the obstacle fell, and the Judge was unbound, no longer prevented from restoring himself. For when order has been defiled and corrupted, break it down and begin anew.

traits.locale_text: L'obstacle chut, et le Juge s'en trouva libéré, désormais libre de s'autorestaurer. Car lorsque l'ordre établi a été souillé et corrompu, il faut le détruire et repartir de rien.

languages.text: Ardından engel düştü ve Yargıç, bağlarından kurtuldu. Artık eski hâline gelmesinin önünde engel yoktu. Zira düzen kirlenip yozlaştığında onu parçalayıp baştan yeni bir düzen oluşturmalısın.
languages.original_text: And the obstacle fell, and the Judge was unbound, no longer prevented from restoring himself. For when order has been defiled and corrupted, break it down and begin anew.
